Key Match Events: Brandon Miller skies for dunk over Jayson Tatum
Luke Kornet gets the and-1 to fall
Jayson Tatum gets up for the beautiful flush
Post-Match Reflections: Tatum scores 29 points, Celtics beat Hornets 113-103 to sweep back-to-back in Charlotte

Others: Boston Celtics sweep back-to-back games in Charlotte
